thread.title: Trump on Twitter (Feb 19) - President's Day, Russian meddling

title: Trump on Twitter (Feb 19) - President's Day, Russian meddling
text: February 20, 2018 / 1:31 AM / in 13 hours Trump on Twitter (Feb 19) - President's Day, Russian meddling Reuters Staff 1 Min Read The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS. The opinions expressed are his own. Reuters has not edited the statements or confirmed their accuracy. @realDonaldTrump : - Have a great, but very reflective, President’s Day! [0852 EST] - Obama was President up to, and beyond, the 2016 Election. So why didn’t he do something about Russian meddling? [1455 EST]
